intent_atoms.description: Establish DocC catalogs for ISOInspectorKit, ISOInspectorCLI, and ISOInspectorApp with architecture and workflow articles seeded for future expansion.
Add DocC generation test coverage to enforce catalog presence and ensure the documentation build script remains executable.
Introduce scripts/generate_documentation.sh and wire the Swift-DocC plugin dependency so swift package generate-documentation produces static-hostable archives for every target.
Update repository documentation (README, execution workplan) with DocC workflow details and ensure generated artifacts are ignored under Documentation/DocC.
Generated DocC bundles are ignored under Documentation/DocC directory.
Use Swift-DocC plugin dependency to generate static-hostable archives for every target.
Run DocC publishing in CI via the docc-archives GitHub Actions job, generating and uploading bundles on every pipeline execution.

functional_units.name: DocC Catalogs for ISOInspectorKit
functional_units.description: Provides documentation catalogs containing architecture and workflow articles for the ISOInspectorKit target.

functional_units.name: DocC Catalogs for ISOInspectorCLI
functional_units.description: Provides documentation catalogs containing architecture and workflow articles for the ISOInspectorCLI target.

functional_units.name: DocC Catalogs for ISOInspectorApp
functional_units.description: Provides documentation catalogs containing architecture and workflow articles for the ISOInspectorApp target.

functional_units.name: DocC Generation Test Coverage
functional_units.description: Enforces presence of DocC catalogs and ensures the documentation build script remains executable through automated tests.

functional_units.name: generate_documentation.sh Script
functional_units.description: Shell script that runs swift package generate-documentation to produce static-hostable archives for every target.

functional_units.name: Swift-DocC Plugin Dependency Integration
functional_units.description: Integrates Swift-DocC plugin so that swift package generate-documentation generates documentation bundles.

functional_units.name: CI DocC Publishing Job
functional_units.description: GitHub Actions job that runs docc-archives to generate and upload DocC bundles on each pipeline execution.
